body_html:
I have Cuda 9.0 , cudnn 7.0 on Ubuntu 16.04.
I built Tensorflow 1.6 since the release notes states it has pre-compiled binaries for cuda 9.0 and cudnn 7.0.

ldconfig -v: libcublas.so.9.0

upon running:

import tensorflow as tf

I still get the error:
ImportError: libcublas.so.8.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
My Questions:

1. Shouldn't Tensorflow 1.6 work with cuda 9.0/ cudnn 7.0 ?
2. Is there any way I can continue using cuda 9.0 ?? I really cannot use 8.0

body:
I have **Cuda 9.0 , cudnn 7.0 on Ubuntu 16.04**.
I built Tensorflow 1.6 since the release notes states it has pre-compiled binaries for cuda 9.0 and cudnn 7.0.

`ldconfig -v: libcublas.so.9.0`

upon running:

> import tensorflow as tf

I still get the error:
`ImportError: libcublas.so.8.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
`
My Questions:

**1. Shouldn't Tensorflow 1.6 work with cuda 9.0/ cudnn 7.0 ?
2. Is there any way I can continue using cuda 9.0 ?? I really cannot use 8.0**
